name: EscapeTheDungeon
description:
This is my first gamejam. I apologize for not being able to publish this with OpenGL, for some reason it would'nt load in.

Controls:

WASD to Move, SPACE to jump, SHIFT to activate the power of the active Character, LEFT CLICK to attack with knight and viking

SCROLL to zoom in/out, RIGHT CLICK to switch between characters.

Download:

Download ZIP File, unzip and execute the .exe file.
